entry.tran: (人或车)被大雪困住的，因大雪而受阻的
entry.def: If people or vehicles are snowbound, they cannot go anywhere because of heavy snow.

example.tran: 这个村子被大雪封住了。

means.word_mean: 1. confined or shut in by heavy snow
